user_question: What are the basic rules of beach volleyball and generate an image of a beach volleyball match?
final_answer: Basic rules of beach volleyball: 1) Teams consist of two players. 2) Matches are played best of three sets. 3) Each set is played to 21 points, with a two-point margin needed to win. 4) Players are not allowed to touch the net. Image of a beach volleyball match generated. The dimensions of a beach volleyball court are 16 meters long and 8 meters wide.
